attributes.action: Pay per view events on any UK platform should have a maximum price £1
attributes.additional_details: People on an average salary (or below) are paying a disproportionate amount of their hard earned money to watch per view events in the UK. Boxing and wrestling have priced the normal fan out of events for many years and now the premier league have announced they are following in this path. It is not right that only those on higher salaries can watch premium events; sport and entertainment should be available to all.
attributes.background: Set a maximum price of £1 in law for any pay per view events shown on UK media platforms

rejection.details: The Government is not responsible for the price of pay per view events. This is a matter for the organisers and broadcasters.
